description: The humor arises from the ironic claim of inventing the term for copying others' work.
title: The Original Idea
n_1: In a bustling lab, Alex reveals his latest 'invention' to Jordan.
c1_1: Guess what? I invented a new word!
n_2: Alex leans in, a grin spreading across his face.
n_3: A moment of silence as the irony sinks in.
n_4: Both burst into laughter, enjoying the intellectual jest.
